definition.content:
[Tenable.io](https://www.tenable.com/) is a cloud platform for vulnerability discovery, assessment, and prioritization. It enhances visibility through asset discovery and helps organizations manage their security posture effectively.

This dashboard provides insights into user actions, system events, scans, and security control tasks, such as managing permissions, assigning roles, and other security events.

**Tips:**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.


For more information, refer to the [Tenable.io Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/tenable_io/).
